Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.view

Class LoginView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.view.TerminalView
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.view.LoginView
public class LoginView extends TerminalView
This Class represent the LoginView, which handles the initial input for logging the player into a Lobby and connecting to the server

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Asks the player their login data, validates them and then sends a message to the server to log the Player in. Finally, if the login was successful it redirects to the waiting room
